title: Statue Of Liberty National Monument: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar       Join us for a ranger program! Daily tour schedule is posted at the Flagpole.  The program lasts approximately 30 minutes. The unique experience explains the conception, construction, and restoration of one of the world's greatest monuments.  Additionally, one will learn about island land history and the New York harbor environs. Park Rangers will provide answers to many questions you may have. Perhaps you will have an opportunity to reflect upon what liberty means to you personally. Tours are free.
